## HW-1.2.1

Re-create the following plot as closely as possible. 

![](img/phd.png)

```{r}
# INSERT CODE HERE
library(ggplot2)

df <- read.csv('./PhDPublications.csv')

df$kids <- ifelse(df$kids > 0, "1+", "0")
df$gender <- factor(df$gender, levels = c("female", "male"))
df$gender <- reorder(df$gender, c("female", "male"))
df$married <- factor(df$married, levels = c("yes", "no"))
df$married <- reorder(df$married, c("yes", "no"))


g = ggplot(df, aes(x=mentor, y=articles, color=kids)) +
  geom_point(size=2) +
  geom_smooth(method="loess", se=FALSE) +
  facet_grid(married ~ gender) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits=c(-1, 20), expand=c(0,0)) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits=c(-3, 80), expand=c(0,0)) +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill='white'),
        panel.grid.major = element_line(color='grey'),
        panel.grid.minor = element_line(color='grey'),
        panel.border = element_rect(color = "black", fill = NA, linewidth = 0.5),
        strip.background = element_rect(fill='grey', color='black'),
        text=element_text(size=10),
        axis.text.y=element_text(),
        axis.text.x=element_text(),
        axis.ticks.y=element_line(color='black'),
        axis.ticks.x=element_line(color='black'),
        plot.title=element_text(size=10),
        axis.title.x=element_text(size=10),
        axis.title.y=element_text(size=10),
        legend.title=element_text(size=10),
        strip.text.x=element_text(size=10, label=c("Female", "Male")),
        strip.text.y=element_text(size=10, angle=270, label=c("Married", "Unmarried")),
        strip.placement = "right",
        legend.key = element_rect(fill='white')) +
  labs(x="", y="", color="Number of kids", shape="Number of kids") +
  coord_fixed(ratio = 3)
g = g + 
  labs(x="Number of articles (mentor)", y="Number of articles (candidate)")

g = g + 
  scale_color_manual(values=c("darkblue", "yellow"), guide = guide_legend(override.aes = list(size=4)))

g
```

## HW-1.2.1

Re-create the following plot as closely as possible. 

![](img/gapminder.png)


```{r}
# INSERT CODE HERE
library(gapminder)

data("gapminder")

g <- ggplot(gapminder, aes(x=year, y=pop)) +
  geom_line(aes(col=continent, group=country)) +
  scale_color_manual(values = rep("black", 5), guide=FALSE) +
  facet_wrap(~continent, ncol=3) +
  scale_y_log10(labels = function(x) format(x, scientific = FALSE, big.mark = ",")) +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill='white'),
        panel.grid.major = element_line(color='grey'),
        panel.grid.minor = element_line(color='grey'),
        panel.border = element_rect(color = "black", fill = NA, linewidth = 0.5),
        axis.text.x = element_text(size = 10),
        axis.text.y = element_text(size = 10),
        axis.title.x = element_text(size = 10),
        axis.title.y = element_text(size = 10),
        plot.title = element_text(size = 12),
        strip.text = element_text(size = 10),
        strip.background = element_rect(fill='grey', color='black'),
        plot.margin = unit(c(0, 0, 0, 0), "mm")) +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Population", title = "Population change around the world, 1957-2007") +
  xlim(1950, 2007) +
  coord_fixed(ratio = 12)

g
```
